headline: Marotta Controls Selected by Bell for Power System on MV-75 Future Long Range Assault Aircraft
summary: Static inverter award marks new product launch, customer relationship, and entry into U.S. Army weapon system development program Marotta Controls static inverter selected for FLRAA Marotta Controls has been selected by Bell Textron Inc. to provide a static inverter for the MV-75 Future Long Range Assault Aircraft (FLRAA).
